ai.summary: McSherry's Lane is a short, easy 1.8 km walk in the UK suitable for families and casual walkers. It follows a quiet rural lane with gentle scenery and minimal technical difficulty.
ai.terrain_summary: The route is predominantly flat with a mix of smooth tarmac and packed gravel. Some sections may be uneven or muddy after rain, so wear sensible footwear.
ai.safety_notes: Be aware of occasional vehicle traffic on the lane. Wear sturdy shoes and appropriate clothing for the weather. Check the forecast and daylight hours before you go, take a charged phone, and tell someone your plans. Keep dogs under control and stay on the public path.
recommended_gear: Weather-appropriate clothing and a light rain jacket
Phone with maps or offline navigation
ai.best_seasons: All year, with spring and autumn offering particularly pleasant conditions and scenery.
